评论详情: I loved this top so much but it was just a back up emergency order for a party I needed a pink outfit for. However, I am glad I ordered it anyway because now I know how amazing it is. The material is crazy soft and feels so smooth. It is also very comfortable and the color is just like in the picture! I highly recommend, it really hugs your figure but also is stretchy at the same time. The double lined part is also a huge bonus.
Love color
Daughter loved it and it looked really good on her
Very flattering and soft. I want every color
Expected a crop top but this was way too short.  Pic makes it look longer for sure.  Returned
Very flattering, feels thick and a very good material, so soft.
So comfy my go to top
True to size. A bit thin, but it’s not see thru. I don’t need to wear a bra with it since it’s fitted.
The fabric is amazing and the length is perfect. I love how it feels. Next time I would get a small though!
slight stretch material and not see through.
Great quality. Great price. Sims dupe for sure
Love it! It's silky smooth and pretty color

This is an awesome top and makes a great staple top to add to your wardrobe. Once I tried it on I fell in love and bought 3 more in different colors. I have been working out regularly for like 2mos and ready to show it off haha. These tops can be worn for casual event or dressed up with jeans and heels. Super cute and in the fall add a puffer vest. It’s very versatile. And I’m all about multi use and multi purpose minimalist stuff. True to size. No complaints. I don’t dry this but I’ve washed it a few times and no issues, and just hang dry. I like it!
Very soft and fitted. Just the right length.
New fav shirt fit great

评论概述: Good top but the sleeves are kind of short
评论详情: I usually order a small but I feel like I could have sized down as it was a little loose on my arms. I really like the feel and thickness of the top. It’s not see through. However, I’m 5’6” and have long arms but the sleeves were kind of short. It would be nice if they were an inch or 2 longer
this top is so cute and flattering. its the perfect length (not cropped at all) and the neckline is so cute. definetly will be buying in more colors and more from this brand.

评论概述: Looks just like the picture, nice too
评论详情: Love the stretchy material and square neck. Bought to wear with jeans and maybe for layering in the winter. Good staple item to have and can dress up or down
I love it so much i rave about it every day. It’s a staple in my closet. Please I’m begging you sponser me or pr me please I love this sweater so much. Snatched you so good

Nice, comfortable material. Flattering shape and neckline. Single lined, not double lined. The double lined ones are too thick for me.  My only caveat is that it’s short. Not sure quite short enough to be a crop top, but shorter than I’d like. Still looks good though.

评论概述: Don’t think about, just buy it. NOW.
评论详情: I have never written a review, but this shirt? It’s the ONE, girl. It’s soft and stretchy, but clings to you in all the right places AND is not see-through. Just get it. You won’t regret it.
This shirt is ok but let’s be honest it’s not half as good as skims

评论概述: Sleeves are very short in length
评论详情: The material and fit of this shirt is immaculate. I love the shade and you dont have to wear a bra with it. I was disappointed by the length of the sleeves though. I have longer arms and they stop 3 inches above my wrist and it looks awkward. I end up rolling them up a bit to make it more comfortable. This being the only downfall, this is otherwise a great top.
Great price and quality
i love this shirt so much. the material is soft, comfortable, and well made. very flattering and the color is exactly how it appears in the photos. Just bought more of them :)
So cute perfect got a size small I’m 120 36dd and it’s the perfect size for reference!!
The top is very soft and able to wash well. I like the quality of the material and the way it fit. It is not see-through. It has a thickness to it.

I like the square neckline. This brand is always 10/10 with their releases. It’s so flattering. It’s full length. The XS fits me greater (I sized down for compression and so it’s more fitted in The waist). It’s stretchy and super soft. You can dress it up or down or layer it with other clothes.

This shirt color is very beautiful. Easy to clean and wash. The material is thicker and not super see through. It is form fitting. This makes a great casual shirt. The shirt is definitely true to size. I love it. The material is soft.

I'm not usually a big fan of synthetic materials, but this one had a lovely smooth and silky texture. The material was thick enough not to be see-through.  I ordered my usual size and it is very snug for sure.  It's a nice color and will be a pretty good staple shirt for me this winter.  Overall, I like it.

Looks and fits just perfect. Beautiful color, very soft and smooth fitting, double layer of fabric, so there’s not transparency, very good quality. I really love it, i could wear it everyday so nice and comfortable.

I love this brand and I highly recommend. This shirt is soft and smooth, feels nice on the skin. It’s tight and slim fitting. Top can be dressed up or down. The fabric is double lined and really great quality. I ordered size small and fits great. I am 5’3” and weight 130 lbs for size reference. The material is stretchy. It’s very comfortable. I ordered the color ash, but sent me light gray, bummed that I got the wrong color and the reason for the 4 stars instead of 5. But overall a nice top.

I love the cute but basic design and how you can pair it with many things. It fits well and is very comfortable. It is good quality and not transparent or thin. You can dress it up or down and it is a great basic for fall and winter.

I got the 'Ash' color and it is the perfect medium grey with a bit of depth to it, super pretty in person! I am really impressed by the material as well, it is incredibly soft and high quality and feels similar to my similar, much more expensive name brand tops. The top does have some stretch but doesn't thin out or become too see through which I really like. I am usually a small/medium and didn't want this to be too fitted so I went with the medium and it fits perfectly. The neckline is very flattering and there's plenty of room in the bust so it doesn't get too tight and flatten things out. I'll be getting a lot of wear out of this. Highly recommend!

I got this for my 13 year old daughter for school and she loves it! It’s sooo pretty on her, not too tight and not too loose either. It fits just right how it’s supposed to. She’s a size M and I’d say it’s true to size also. The color is a beautiful shade you don’t really get that option color too often either which is another reason I picked it out for her!
